songs.title: Take it easy
songs.chords: (G)Well Im a-(G)runnin down the road tryn to loosen my load ...

songs.title: The Weight
songs.chords:
(G)I pulled into Nazareth was feelin about half past dead
I just need some place where I can lay my head ...

songs.title: Bad Moon Rising
songs.chords:
(G)I see the bad moon a-rising
I see trouble on the way
I see earthquakes and lightnin ...

songs.title: Got me fever
songs.chords:
(G)You will nevel know how much I love you
 you never know how much I care ...
